video_title: This is How to Actually Be Better at Video Games @Emiru @Tectone @AsmonTV @steakandeggspod
transcript:
everything that we know about how to

every single time yeah every single time

actually consolidates into long-term
memory and so even when I was playing
radon and stuff I would not Redondo
Radigan yeah right so what I would do is
like I'd play for like half an hour

five days I beat it it was easy so if
you play for five hours at a stretch
